channel.title: How do i get case ids?
channel.description: for my custom interfaces how do i get the case ids for the buttons and stuff? my server box dosent display them and my client box dosent display them im starting to get frustrated

item.title: How do i get case ids?
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

Ok so I know what I need to do just not sure how to do it so I’m going to guess here

So in the code I posted above would I declare a public void so that I can then call the car the name is saved to in clickmost?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get case ids?

item.title: How do i get case ids?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

yugioh101:

ok i have buttons for warn, kick, mute, and jail so thats what im trying to make them do.

find your mute/kick etc commands, and use some of the code from them for your buttons (i hope you can recognize what parts of the code do what)
then in clickingmost.java

somewhere inside, add:

case ####:
//function stuff
break;

the #### being the case id you get when clicking the button you want to code.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get case ids?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“yugioh101, post:7, topic:341917”]ok now how coulc i call a variable from the client file from inside the clicking most file?

somthing like server.client kinda thing? cause my other variable is stored when i right click option on someones name, is there a way to use that variable in the clickingmost file?

heres the code for my right click,

[code] case 139:
ResetAttack();
if ((playerRights >= 1)){
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(p5.playerName)];
sendQuest(“Moderator Options for player:”+p5.playerName, 15003);
showInterface(15000);
sM("Welcome to the Mod Controll Pannel for "+p5.playerName );
} else {
if(isInDuel())
{
sM(“You can’t follow in a duel!”);
break;
}

followID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
 	println("Following started for" + !getClient(followID).inBG());
if((getClient(followID).inBG() && !inBG()) || (!getClient(followID).inBG() && inBG()))
{
	followID = 0;
	toX = absX;
	toY = absY;
	sM("You can't follow that person.");
}[/code]

i want to be able to use the c.sM command in the clickingmost file, how can i do this?[/quote]

can you explain more clearly what you want to make a button do etc?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get case ids?

item.title: How do i get case ids?
item.dc:creator: @yugioh101 yugioh101
item.description:
@yugioh101 wrote:

ok now how coulc i call a variable from the client file from inside the clicking most file?

somthing like server.client kinda thing? cause my other variable is stored when i right click option on someones name, is there a way to use that variable in the clickingmost file?

heres the code for my right click,

[code] case 139:
ResetAttack();
if ((playerRights >= 1)){
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(p5.playerName)];
sendQuest(“Moderator Options for player:”+p5.playerName, 15003);
showInterface(15000);
sM("Welcome to the Mod Controll Pannel for "+p5.playerName );
} else {
if(isInDuel())
{
sM(“You can’t follow in a duel!”);
break;
}

followID = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();
 	println("Following started for" + !getClient(followID).inBG());
if((getClient(followID).inBG() && !inBG()) || (!getClient(followID).inBG() && inBG()))
{
	followID = 0;
	toX = absX;
	toY = absY;
	sM("You can't follow that person.");
}[/code]

i want to be able to use the c.sM command in the clickingmost file, how can i do this?

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get case ids?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

yugioh101:

i have that now but when i use the action buttons and i do like case 58158 which is what it told me was my button in my custom interface and i put anything there it gets no responce?

you have to put the case in clickingmost.java
you also have to put a function under the case id for it to know what to do…
such as c.closeInterface(); etc.

item.title: How do i get case ids?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

find case 185: in client.java (server sided)

and replace it with this:

		case 185:
			// clicking most buttons
			actionButtonId =  misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
			if (!validClient)
				break;
			if(playerRights >= 1){
			println("ab=" + actionButtonId);
			}
			if (!antiHax())
				break;
				resetAction();
				server.clickingMost.clicking(playerId);
				break;

i take no credit as this was pulled from delta

Read full topic
